backend/main.mo: Main Motoko actor implementing user registration, profile management, package/payment handling, admin functions, and blob storage with role-based access control. Includes types for UserProfile, Package, Payment, PaymentProof, and AdminStats with authorization mixins.
feature_evidence.json: Feature evidence report documenting AboutUs page creation with six sections (500-700 words), responsive styling with emerald/black theme, ThemeContext integration, and routing setup with high confidence test mappings.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: JSON-formatted summaries of all frontend components including App.tsx routing, animated sections (Hero, Pricing, Testimonials, FAQ), Header/Footer, authentication pages, user/admin dashboards, and utility components with scroll animations and theme support.
frontend/index.css: Global Tailwind CSS configuration with OKLCH color system defining light/dark theme CSS variables for background, foreground, primary, secondary, muted, accent, destructive, border, and sidebar colors.
frontend/index.html: HTML entry point with SEO meta tags (title, description, keywords), Open Graph and Twitter card metadata for Evergreen Hub affiliate marketing platform, and root div for React mounting.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Main React application with TanStack Router setup defining routes for landing page, auth pages (register/login/admin-login), contact, about-us, user dashboard, and admin dashboard with ThemeProvider, AuthProvider, QueryClientProvider wrappers.
frontend/src/components/admin/ImageModal: Dialog modal component that displays payment screenshot images in a centered, responsive layout with max dimensions for optimal viewing.
frontend/src/components/admin/PackageMod: Modal component for creating and editing course packages with form fields for name, price, and courses; uses React Query mutations to create or update packages via the backend actor.
frontend/src/components/AppearanceSettin: Dialog modal component for theme selection (system/light/dark) with radio buttons, icons (Sun/Moon/Monitor), and OK/Cancel actions that integrate with ThemeContext.
A sticky countdown timer banner component that displays a 24-hour countdown with hours, minutes, and seconds, resetting when it reaches zero. Uses emerald gradient styling and animates with a pulsing clock icon.
frontend/src/components/CoursePackagesMo: A modal dialog that displays available course packages in a grid layout, fetching data from an API and allowing users to select packages for purchase. Includes package images, pricing, course lists, and integrates with a PaymentModal component.
frontend/src/components/EvergreenAIChatb: A draggable floating chatbot component with AI-powered responses about courses, packages, pricing, and account management. Features a collapsible chat interface with message history, drag-and-drop positioning, and animated border effects.
frontend/src/components/FAQSection.tsx: An accordion-based FAQ section component that displays common questions about affiliate marketing with scroll animations. Contains five predefined questions covering topics like experience requirements, results timeline, and support options.
frontend/src/components/FloatingWhatsApp: A fixed floating button positioned at the bottom-right corner that opens a WhatsApp chat with a predefined phone number and message. Features emerald green styling with hover effects and shadow animations.
frontend/src/components/Footer.tsx: A footer component with glassmorphism effects, animated glowing dots, and sections for quick links, legal links, and social media. Features theme-aware styling with gradient backgrounds and includes brand information and navigation links.
frontend/src/components/Header.tsx: A sticky header component with logo, navigation, theme toggle, and user authentication controls. Includes desktop dropdown menus and mobile sidebar integration, with role-based navigation for admin and regular users.
frontend/src/components/HeroSection.tsx: Hero section component with animated background, brand headline, and CTA buttons for buying courses or contacting via WhatsApp. Includes ripple effect on button clicks and authentication-based navigation to course packages modal or login.
frontend/src/components/InstagramSection: Instagram promotional section displaying a profile link with animated card, gradient styling, and CTA buttons to follow or connect on Instagram. Uses scroll animation hook for fade-in effects.
frontend/src/components/MobileSidebar.ts: Mobile sidebar drawer with navigation menu, theme toggle, and authentication-aware routing. Features glassmorphism design with animated decorative elements and collapsible courses dropdown.
frontend/src/components/PaymentGateway.t: Payment gateway display component showing PhonePe QR code and masked bank account details (India Post Payment Bank) with payment instructions for manual transfers.
frontend/src/components/PaymentModal.tsx: Modal dialog for completing course purchases, integrating PaymentGateway and PaymentProofForm components. Handles payment proof submission via actor mutation and displays package details.
frontend/src/components/PaymentProofForm: Form component for uploading payment proof with transaction ID and screenshot validation. Features file upload with progress tracking, converts images to ExternalBlob, and includes WhatsApp support option.
frontend/src/components/PricingSection.t: Displays six course packages (E-LITE to ULTRA PRO) with pricing from ₹699 to ₹14999, featuring course lists, buy buttons, and integration with PaymentModal. Includes authentication checks and scroll animations.
frontend/src/components/ProtectedRoute.t: Route guard component that redirects unauthenticated users to login and enforces admin-only access where required. Shows loading spinner during initialization and handles profile setup checks.
frontend/src/components/ScrollToTopButto: Fixed button that appears after scrolling 300px down the page and smoothly scrolls back to top when clicked. Uses ArrowUp icon with fade-in/out transitions.
frontend/src/components/TestimonialsSect: Displays three customer testimonials in a grid layout with 5-star ratings, avatars, and quotes. Includes scroll animation effects.
frontend/src/components/ThemeToggleSwitc: Button component that toggles between light and dark themes using sun/moon icons with smooth rotation animations. Integrates with ThemeContext.
frontend/src/components/VideoEditingSect: Promotes professional video editing service at ₹500 per video with two CTAs: WhatsApp order button and payment modal integration. Includes authentication checks and scroll animations.
frontend/src/components/WhyChooseUsSecti: Showcases four key benefits (Beginner Friendly, Step-by-Step Guidance, Lifetime Access, WhatsApp Support) in a responsive card grid with images and descriptions. Includes scroll animations.
frontend/src/components/YouTubeSection.t: Embeds YouTube channel feed for @evergreengamerz with subscribe button linking to the channel. Features responsive video player and scroll animations.
frontend/src/contexts/AuthContext.tsx: Authentication context provider that manages user authentication state, profile data, and admin status using Internet Identity and backend actor; provides login, logout, and profile refresh functions.
frontend/src/contexts/ThemeContext.tsx: Theme context provider that manages light/dark/system theme preferences with localStorage persistence and system preference detection; applies theme classes to document root.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Custom hook that creates and manages the backend actor instance with authentication, initializes access control with admin token from URL params, and invalidates dependent queries when actor changes.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Internet Identity authentication hook and provider that manages AuthClient lifecycle, login/logout flows, identity persistence, and authentication status states.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: Collection of React Query hooks for fetching data from the backend including packages, payment proofs, user profiles, and admin statistics; all hooks depend on the actor being available.
frontend/src/hooks/useScrollAnimation.ts: Custom hook using IntersectionObserver to detect when elements enter viewport and trigger visibility state changes for scroll-based animations.
frontend/src/index.css: Global styles with Tailwind directives, CSS custom properties for light/dark themes using OKLCH color space, and keyframe animations for hero sections, CTAs, glows, and scroll effects.
frontend/src/layouts/AdminDashboardLayou: Admin dashboard layout with sidebar navigation (stats, users, packages, payments), mobile sheet menu, and protected route wrapper requiring admin role.
frontend/src/layouts/UserDashboardLayout: User dashboard layout with sidebar navigation (home, dashboard, packages, profile, password, appearance), mobile sheet menu, and protected route wrapper for authenticated users.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Application entry point that sets up React Query, Internet Identity provider, and renders the root App component.
frontend/src/pages/AboutUs.tsx: About Us page with scroll animations, SEO meta tags, and sections describing Evergreen Hub's mission to empower users with digital learning and earning opportunities.
frontend/src/pages/admin/AdminStats.tsx: Admin dashboard displaying key statistics (total users, sales, revenue, pending payments) fetched from backend with auto-refresh every 30 seconds.
frontend/src/pages/admin/PackageManageme: Admin interface for managing course packages with CRUD operations, status toggling, and a modal for adding/editing packages.
frontend/src/pages/admin/PaymentManageme: Admin page for reviewing payment proofs with filtering by status, approve/reject actions, and screenshot viewing functionality.
Admin interface for managing users with search functionality, user blocking/unblocking, and deletion capabilities.
frontend/src/pages/AdminLogin.tsx: Admin login page using Internet Identity with role verification, redirecting admins to dashboard or denying access to non-admin users.
frontend/src/pages/Contact.tsx: Contact page displaying WhatsApp and phone contact options with call-to-action buttons for user support.
frontend/src/pages/Login.tsx: User login page using Internet Identity authentication with remember-me option and links to registration and password recovery.
frontend/src/pages/Register.tsx: User registration page with form validation for name, email, phone, password, and terms acceptance; integrates Internet Identity authentication and calls backend registerUser API.
frontend/src/pages/user/ChangePassword.t: Informational page explaining that password management is handled through Internet Identity's cryptographic authentication system.
frontend/src/pages/user/DashboardOvervie: User dashboard overview page displaying statistics cards (total packages, total spent, pending payments, approved packages) and a recent activity table showing payment proofs with status badges.
frontend/src/pages/user/MyPackages.tsx: User page displaying all purchased packages with payment proof details including package name, price, transaction ID, submission date, and approval status with color-coded badges.
User profile settings page with a form to update name and phone number, displaying email as read-only and using toast notifications for success/error feedback.
frontend/src/utils/urlParams.ts: Utility module for extracting and managing URL parameters from both regular query strings and hash-based routing, with sessionStorage persistence support and functions to clear parameters from URLs.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Tailwind CSS configuration with custom color scheme using OKLCH color space, extended theme with container queries, typography plugin, custom animations, and Inter font family.
project_state.json: Project state document describing Evergreen Hub affiliate marketing website with green/black theme, listing architectural notes, existing features including hero section, pricing packages, YouTube integration, and WhatsApp contact system.
